snippet: Activists warned that the constitutional change, part of a mounting crackdown on dissent, would in effect place the island under an undeclared state of martial law....

headline.main: North Korea Fires Four Ballistic Missiles Into Sea Near Japan-Abe
headline.print_headline: North Korea Fires Four Ballistic Missiles Into Sea Near Japan-Abe

lead_paragraph: Activists warned that the constitutional change, part of a mounting crackdown on dissent, would in effect place the island under an undeclared state of martial law.
